page.description: Returns the number of times one Case Insensitive string is found in another.
page.prototype: Count as N = OCCURSI(C searchfor,C searchin)

argument.name: searchfor
argument.description: The character string to find and count.

page.discussion: OCCURSI() returns the number of times the searchfor is found in the searchin. The searchin cannot be a memo field. Case insensitive.
page.example: occursi("i", STATE) -> 4, if STATE contains "Mississippi" occursi("at", "The cat in the hat") -> 2 occursi("ab", "ABCDabcd") -> 2
